title: How to Make Dahi Bhallas in North Indian Style

steps.headline: Add white lentils powder, yellow lentils powder, salt, cumin seeds and water in a bowl.
steps.description: Do not add too much water as the batter must be a tight one.

steps.headline: Prepare dough of it.
Add oil in a frying pan and heat it.
Add water in a bowl.
Dip the right hand into the water.
Take some batter in the fingers.
Give it shape of a patty with the fingers.
Make a hole in the center of the patty with the help of the thumb or tip of a spoon.
Carefully place them in the oil.
Prepare and add more vadas in the oil.
Deep fry them in the oil.
Turn the side with the spatula to fry them on other side also.
Remove them from the oil once they are fried in oil.
Place them on paper towels or a newspaper to absorb the extra oil.
Take some water in a pan and soak the vadas in it for 3o minutes.
Take each one of them and press lightly to squeeze out the water.
Beat the fresh curd with the spoon or the blender and add the vadas.
Sprinkle with the slices of the ginger.
Sprinkle the dahi masala powder before serving.
Keep the dahi bhallas in refrigerator.
